Title: Storm
Actors: Kerry Fox, Anamaria Marinca, Stephen Dillane, Rolf Lassgård
Plot: Hannah Maynard, a prosecutor of Hague's Tribunal for war crimes in former Yugoslavia, charges a Serbian commander for killing Bosnians. However, her main witness might be lying, so the court sends a team to Bosnia to investigate.
Country: Germany, Denmark, Netherlands, Sweden, Bosnia and Herzegovina
